p: Regarding antifungal activity, several studies have demonstrated the potential of essential oils to inhibit the proliferation of several types of fungi in food products, such as Aspergillus, Microsporum, Mucor, Penicillium, Eurotium, Debaryomyces, Pichia, Zygosaccharomyces, and Candida. 3, 4, 5, 6
